mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.provider_name , t1.provider_code , t1.validate_state , t1.create_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_time , t1.modify_by from ext_provider_info t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_provider_info t1 set t1.provider_name =#{dto.providerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.provider_code =#{dto.providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.validate_state =#{dto.validateState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_time =systimestamp, t1.modify_by =#{dto.modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_provider_info t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_provider_info t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
